text: Mr. William Lucas (Morris) is always insensitively pushing, Miss Sheila Allen his wife, always palely appealing, Mr. James Maxwell, the editor, always comically abashed by ciency and, in the case of Mr. Richards, with lavish and suitably gaudy colour.
handwritten_text: Mr. William Lucas (Morris) is always insensitively pushing, Miss Sheila Allen his wife, always palely appealing, Mr. James Maxwell, the editor, always comically abashed by ciency and, in the case of Mr. Richards, with lavish and suitably gaudy colour.
